item.title: FREE mod (if wanted) to person who can figure this out. *still open*
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

[quote=“I SiS I, post:28, topic:83342”]This is all you do. Go in the “characters” folder and press the name you want to change.

Then do:

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3254 character-posy = 3420 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = *********** character-lastlogin = 20070322 character-energy = 29 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 1775

Then change character rights to:

character-rights = 3

Also, make sure you are logged out of your character.[/quote]

he already tried that,try to re-instuled testscape,it might work.

Read full topic
item.source: FREE mod (if wanted) to person who can figure this out. *still open*

item.title: FREE mod (if wanted) to person who can figure this out. *still open*
item.dc:creator: @I_SiS_I I SiS I
item.description:
@I_SiS_I wrote:

This is all you do. Go in the “characters” folder and press the name you want to change.

Then do:

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3254 character-posy = 3420 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = *********** character-lastlogin = 20070322 character-energy = 29 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 1775

Then change character rights to:

character-rights = 3

Also, make sure you are logged out of your character.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

[quote=“Nintendo_G, post:6, topic:83342”][quote author=ikick221 link=topic=122461.msg1198585#msg1198585 date=1177264640]
you cant change char lvl in file if it is encrypted like that.
[/quote]
not level my rights I’m trying to make me owner, or is that what you mean.

Well then how DO I encrypt it, that’s what I’m asking.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 07:03:28 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Zenadix link=topic=122461.msg1198547#msg1198547 date=1177264247]
ok its time for me to step in
(i dunno why ppl post if they dontt know the answer)

The part of the code that says

/start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“eviltwin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

Change “eviltwin” by your username
And your done!
[/quote]
eviltwin IS my username[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 07:26:25 AM[/size][hr]Uh, incase nobody has noticed I still kind of need help, you guys haven’t gotten me anywhere. Nobody has even said anything about how to get an ancient menu by the friends icon.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 08:42:49 AM[/size][hr]I don’t think anybody knows how to fix the problem…somebody check the coding of the first code I put towards the bottem after all the names for people that are admins mods etc. Is there a code there that’s keeping me from being the owner? Also when I try to edit my stats (from my full character file) I edit the stat to 99 and put xp 14000000 but when I try to load it it doesn’t work either.[/quote]

it is the same a char rights. you cant just change…

Read full topic
